name: Underlord
title: Vrogros
lore: Commander of the Abyssal Horde, Vrogros opens rifts to bring his army to any battlefield.

firestorm.name: Firestorm
firestorm.description: Rains fire over an area, dealing damage and burning enemies over time.

pitOfMalice.name: Pit of Malice
pitOfMalice.description: Creates a pit that roots enemies repeatedly.

atrophy_aura.name: Atrophy Aura
atrophy_aura.description: Reduces enemy attack damage and permanently gains damage when enemies die nearby.

darkRift.name: Dark Rift
darkRift.description: Opens a rift to teleport Underlord and nearby allies to a friendly unit or building.
